verses.verse: Now the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> gathered <S%H622>together<s%> their <S%H4264>armies<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%>, and were gathered <S%H622>together<s%> at <S%H7755>Shochoh<s%>, which belongs to <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> between <S%H7755>Shochoh<s%> and <S%H5825>Azekah<s%>, in <S%H658>Ephes<s%>–dammim.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were gathered <S%H622>together<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> by the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H425>Elah<s%>, and set the <S%H4421>battle<s%> in <S%H6186>array<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>.

And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> on a <S%H2022>mountain<s%> on the one <S%H3478>side<s%>, and Israel <S%H5975>stood<s%> on a <S%H2022>mountain<s%> on the other <S%H1516>side<s%>: and there was a valley between them.

And there went <S%H3318>out<s%> a <S%H376>champion<s%> out of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H1555>Goliath<s%>, of <S%H1661>Gath<s%>, whose <S%H1363>height<s%> was <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> and a <S%H2239>span<s%>.

And he had a <S%H3553>helmet<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> upon his <S%H7218>head<s%>, and he was <S%H3847>armed<s%> with a <S%H8302>coat<s%> of <S%H7193>mail<s%>; and the <S%H4948>weight<s%> of the <S%H8302>coat<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%>.
And he had shin <S%H4697>armor<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> upon his <S%H7272>legs<s%>, and a <S%H3591>spear<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> between his <S%H3802>shoulders<s%>.

And the <S%H6086>staff<s%> of his <S%H2595>spear<s%> was like a <S%H707>weaver<s%>'s <S%H4500>log<s%>; and his <S%H2595>spear<s%>'s <S%H3852>head<s%> weighed <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%>: and one <S%H5375>bearing<s%> a <S%H6793>shield<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> before <S%H6440>him<s%>.

And he <S%H5975>stood<s%> and <S%H7121>cried<s%> unto the <S%H4634>armies<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3318>them<s%>, Why are you come out to set your <S%H4421>battle<s%> in <S%H6186>array<s%>? am not I a <S%H6430>Philistine<s%>, and you <S%H5650>servants<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul<s%>? <S%H1262>choose<s%> you a <S%H376>man<s%> for <S%H3381>you<s%>, and let him come down to me.

If he be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with <S%H5221>me<s%>, and to kill <S%H5650>me<s%>, then will we be your servants: but if I <S%H3201>prevail<s%> against <S%H5221>him<s%>, and kill <S%H5650>him<s%>, then shall you be our servants, and serve <S%H5647>us<s%>.

And the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, I <S%H2778>defy<s%> the <S%H4634>armies<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%>; <S%H5414>give<s%> me a <S%H376>man<s%>, that we may <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>.

When <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> those <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%>, they were <S%H2865>dismayed<s%>, and <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H3372>afraid<s%>.

Now <S%H1732>David<s%> was the <S%H1121>son<s%> of that <S%H376>Ephrathite<s%> of <S%H1035>Beth<s%>–lehem–judah, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3448>Jesse<s%>; and he had <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>: and the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> among <S%H582>men<s%> for an old <S%H2204>man<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>.

And the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1419>oldest<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H310>followed<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to the <S%H4421>battle<s%>: and the <S%H8034>names<s%> of his <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> that <S%H1980>went<s%> to the <S%H4421>battle<s%> were <S%H446>Eliab<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%>, and <S%H4932>next<s%> unto him <S%H41>Abinadab<s%>, and the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H8048>Shammah<s%>.
And <S%H1732>David<s%> was the <S%H6996>youngest<s%>: and the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1419>oldest<s%> <S%H1980>followed<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>.
But <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> from <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to <S%H7462>feed<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H6629>sheep<s%> at <S%H1035>Beth<s%>–lehem.
And the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> drew <S%H5066>near<s%> <S%H7925>morning<s%> and <S%H6150>evening<s%>, and <S%H3320>presented<s%> himself <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.

And <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H3947>Take<s%> now for your <S%H251>brothers<s%> an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H7039>parched<s%> <S%H6235>corn<s%>, and these ten <S%H3899>loaves<s%>, and <S%H7323>run<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to your <S%H251>brothers<s%>;

And <S%H935>carry<s%> these <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H2461>cheeses<s%> unto the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of their <S%H505>thousand<s%>, and <S%H6485>look<s%> how your <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H7965>fare<s%>, and <S%H3947>take<s%> their <S%H6161>pledge<s%>.
Now <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, and <S%H376>they<s%>, and all the men of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, were in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H425>Elah<s%>, <S%H3898>fighting<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and <S%H5203>left<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> with a <S%H8104>keeper<s%>, and <S%H5375>took<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%>, as <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H935>him<s%>; and he came to the <S%H4570>trench<s%>, as the <S%H2428>army<s%> was going <S%H3318>forth<s%> to the <S%H4634>fight<s%>, and <S%H7321>shouted<s%> for the <S%H4421>battle<s%>.
For <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had put the battle in <S%H6186>array<s%>, <S%H4634>army<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H4634>army<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5203>left<s%> his <S%H3627>carriage<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H8104>keeper<s%> of the <S%H3627>carriage<s%>, and <S%H7323>ran<s%> into the <S%H4634>army<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H7592>saluted<s%> his <S%H251>brothers<s%>.

And as he <S%H1696>talked<s%> with <S%H5927>them<s%>, behold, there came up the <S%H376>champion<s%>, the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> of <S%H1661>Gath<s%>, <S%H1555>Goliath<s%> by <S%H8034>name<s%>, out of the <S%H4634>armies<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> according to the <S%H428>same<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%>: and <S%H1732>David<s%> heard <S%H8085>them<s%>.
And all the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, when they <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%>, <S%H5127>fled<s%> from <S%H6440>him<s%>, and were <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3372>afraid<s%>.

And the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Have you <S%H7200>seen<s%> this <S%H376>man<s%> that is come <S%H5927>up<s%>? surely to <S%H2778>defy<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is he come <S%H5927>up<s%>: and it shall <S%H376>be<s%>, that the man who <S%H5221>kills<s%> <S%H4428>him<s%>, the king will <S%H6238>enrich<s%> him with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6239>riches<s%>, and will <S%H5414>give<s%> him his <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, and <S%H6213>make<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H2670>free<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H582>men<s%> that <S%H5975>stood<s%> by <S%H559>him<s%>, saying, What shall be <S%H6213>done<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H5221>kills<s%> <S%H1975>this<s%> <S%H6430>Philistine<s%>, and takes <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel<s%>? for who is this <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H6430>Philistine<s%>, that he should <S%H2778>defy<s%> the <S%H4634>armies<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>?
And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%> him after this <S%H1697>manner<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, So shall it be <S%H6213>done<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> that kills <S%H5221>him<s%>.

And <S%H446>Eliab<s%> his <S%H1419>oldest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> when he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto the <S%H582>men<s%>; and <S%H446>Eliab<s%>'s <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H1732>David<s%>, and he <S%H559>said<s%>, Why came you <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H5203>here<s%>? and with whom have you left <S%H2007>those<s%> <S%H4592>few<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>? I <S%H3045>know<s%> your <S%H2087>pride<s%>, and the <S%H7455>naughtiness<s%> of your <S%H3824>heart<s%>; for you are come <S%H3381>down<s%> that you might <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H4421>battle<s%>.
And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, What have I now <S%H6213>done<s%>? Is there not a <S%H1697>cause<s%>?

And he <S%H5437>turned<s%> from <S%H681>him<s%> <S%H4136>toward<s%> <S%H312>another<s%>, and <S%H559>spoke<s%> after the same <S%H1697>manner<s%>: and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1697>answered<s%> him <S%H7725>again<s%> after the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H1697>manner<s%>.

And when the <S%H1697>words<s%> were <S%H8085>heard<s%> which <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%>, they <S%H5046>rehearsed<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>: and he sent for <S%H3947>him<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, Let no <S%H120>man<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5307>fail<s%> because of <S%H5650>him<s%>; your servant will <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H3898>fight<s%> with this <S%H6430>Philistine<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%>, You are not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> against this <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with <S%H5288>him<s%>: for you are but a youth, and he a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> from his <S%H5271>youth<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, Your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H7462>kept<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, and there <S%H935>came<s%> a <S%H738>lion<s%>, and a <S%H1677>carry<s%>, and <S%H5375>took<s%> a <S%H7716>lamb<s%> out of the <S%H5739>flock<s%>:

And I went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5221>him<s%>, and struck <S%H5337>him<s%>, and delivered it out of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>: and when he <S%H6965>arose<s%> against <S%H2388>me<s%>, I caught him by his <S%H2206>beard<s%>, and <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H4191>him<s%>, and killed him.

Your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H5221>killed<s%> both the <S%H738>lion<s%> and the <S%H1677>carry<s%>: and this <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> shall be as <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H2778>them<s%>, seeing he has defied the <S%H4634>armies<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>.

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3068>moreover<s%>, The Lord that <S%H5337>delivered<s%> me out of the <S%H3027>paw<s%> of the <S%H738>lion<s%>, and out of the <S%H3027>paw<s%> of the <S%H1677>carry<s%>, he will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of this <S%H6430>Philistine<s%>. And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%>, and the Lord be with <S%H3068>you<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3847>armed<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> with his <S%H4055>armour<s%>, and he <S%H5414>put<s%> an <S%H6959>helmet<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> upon his <S%H7218>head<s%>; also he <S%H3847>armed<s%> him with a coat of <S%H8302>mail<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H2296>girded<s%> his <S%H2719>sword<s%> upon his <S%H4055>armour<s%>, and he <S%H2974>tried<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%>; for he had not <S%H5254>tested<s%> <S%H1732>it<s%>. And David <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, I <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H3212>go<s%> with <S%H5254>these<s%>; for I have not tested <S%H1732>them<s%>. And David put them off <S%H5493>him<s%>.

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H4731>staff<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H977>chose<s%> him <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H2512>smooth<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> out of the <S%H5158>brook<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> them in a <S%H7462>shepherd<s%>'s <S%H3627>bag<s%> which he <S%H3219>had<s%>, even in a food bag; and his <S%H7050>sling<s%> was in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>: and he drew <S%H5066>near<s%> to the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%>.

And the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> <S%H3212>came<s%> <S%H1980>on<s%> and drew <S%H7131>near<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>; and the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H6793>shield<s%> went before <S%H6440>him<s%>.

And when the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> looked <S%H5027>about<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, he <S%H959>disdained<s%> <S%H5288>him<s%>: for he was but a youth, and <S%H132>ruddy<s%>, and of a <S%H3303>fair<s%> <S%H4758>favor<s%>.

And the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>, Am I a <S%H3611>dog<s%>, that you <S%H935>come<s%> to me with <S%H4731>poles<s%>? And the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> <S%H7043>cursed<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> by his <S%H430>gods<s%>.

And the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H3212>Come<s%> to <S%H5414>me<s%>, and I will give your <S%H1320>flesh<s%> unto the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>air<s%>, and to the <S%H929>animals<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> to the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%>, You <S%H935>come<s%> to me with a <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and with a <S%H2595>spear<s%>, and with a <S%H3591>shield<s%>: but I <S%H935>come<s%> to you in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H4634>armies<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, whom you have <S%H2778>defied<s%>.

This <S%H3117>day<s%> will the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5462>deliver<s%> you into my <S%H3027>hand<s%>; and I will <S%H5221>strike<s%> <S%H5493>you<s%>, and take your <S%H7218>head<s%> from <S%H5414>you<s%>; and I will give the <S%H6297>carcasses<s%> of the <S%H4264>army<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> unto the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>air<s%>, and to the wild <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>; that all the <S%H776>earth<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> that there <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And all this <S%H6951>assembly<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3467>saves<s%> not with <S%H2719>sword<s%> and <S%H2595>spear<s%>: for the <S%H4421>battle<s%> is the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s, and he will <S%H5414>give<s%> you into our <S%H3027>hands<s%>.

And it came to <S%H6430>pass<s%>, when the Philistine <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H3212>came<s%> and drew <S%H7126>near<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, that <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4116>hurried<s%>, and <S%H7323>ran<s%> toward the <S%H4634>army<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7971>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> in his <S%H3627>bag<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> there a <S%H68>stone<s%>, and <S%H7049>slung<s%> <S%H5221>it<s%>, and struck the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> in his <S%H4696>forehead<s%>, that the <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H2883>sunk<s%> into his <S%H4696>forehead<s%>; and he <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon his <S%H6440>face<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
